text:
Welcome to ~TiddlyWiki and the ~TiddlyWiki community

Visit https://tiddlywiki.com/ to find out more about ~TiddlyWiki and what it can do.

<hr class="poc2go-hr">

This system interfaces multiple TiddlyWikis into a single system.

The wiki runs a [[“single-tiddler mode”|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/defining-single-tiddler-mode-via-the-story-river/9105]] with a modification to the  [[$:/core/ui/PageTemplate/story]] shadow tiddler. Delete the tiddler to return the wiki to 'normal' TW story river. 

<hr class="poc2go-hr">

{{||Pocket-io System}}
